alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, southeastern Pasco, east central Pinellas, Hillsborough and northern Polk Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Poinciana to near Plant City to near Macdill Air Force Base. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, Plant City, Winter Haven, Temple Terrace, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Lutz, St. Petersburg, St. Leo, Zephyrhills South, East Lake-Orient Park and Wesley Chapel South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter
